dependencies.package: mobilesubstrate, firmware (>= 11.0), org.thebigboss.libcolorpicker, ws.hbang.common (>= 1.11), jp.ashikase.libpackageinfo, com.rpetrich.rocketbootstrap (>= 1.0.3)

descriptionlist.description:
New kind of notifications.
About activation: After installation and respring, you should receive any notification to see the activation notification. After that, go to Settings - MessageBubbles and enable the tweak if it is disabled or disable / enable it if it is enabled
About activation: After installation and respring, you should receive any notification to see activation message. After that, go to Settings - MessageBubbles and enable tweak if it is disabled or re-enable if it is already enabled.
